publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-268 Cathy Peattie: Vlaams Blok Visitâ€”That the Parliament notes with concern the visit of Dominiek Lootens-Stael, chairman of the Vlaams Blok group, as part of a delegation of Flemish MPs to the Parliament; further notes the political activities of the group and the concerns of the Foreign and Commonwealth Office about the visit, and calls on the Presiding Officer to reverse his decision to allow Vlaams Blok to visit the Parliament. Supported by: Susan Deacon*, Christine May*, Bill Butler*, Bristow Muldoon*, Cathie Craigie*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Marlyn Glen*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Kate Maclean*, Johann Lamont*

S2M-268 Vlaams Blok Visit (lodged on 19 August 2003) Jackie Baillie*, Elaine Smith*, Mike Watson*, Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Robin Harper*, Helen Eadie*, Scott Barrie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Sarah Boyack*
S2M-268 Vlaams Blok Visit (lodged on 19 August 2003) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-268 Vlaams Blok Visit (lodged on 19 August 2003) Pauline McNeill*
